body_html: I guess cudnn.h usually lives inside /usr/local/cuda/ but I have cuda installed separately but I didn't find that file there either. Also I don't have cuDNN installed with CUDA so had to install it separately.

body: I guess cudnn.h usually lives inside /usr/local/cuda/ but I have cuda installed separately but I didn't find that file there either. Also I don't have cuDNN installed with CUDA so had to install it separately.
